Sentencas: Ni cermet anodes pose considerable problems for SOFC operation in natural gas fuels, particularly with regard to carbon deposition due to hydrocarbon cracking.
Titulo: Development of novel anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Oxide anodes offer a good alternative, particularly if a material combining good electronic and ionic transport properties can be utilised.
Titulo: Development of novel anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In our search for alternative anode materials, we have investigated fluorite-based systems containing reducible early transition metal dopants.
Titulo: Development of novel anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The extent of phase stability has been investigated by solid-state chemical techniques and electrical properties have been investigated by ac impedance techniques as a function of both temperature and oxygen partial pressure.
Titulo: Development of novel anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Nb-Zr-Y-O system has been found to provide a good model system exhibiting reasonable electrical properties.
Titulo: Development of novel anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Niobium pentoxide exhibits a wide range of solid solubility in the yttria-zirconia cubic fluorite system and the fluorite structure is retained under reducing conditions.
Titulo: Development of novel anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electronic conductivity increases as niobium concentration increases; however oxide-ionic conductivity decreases with extent of niobium substitution.
Titulo: Development of novel anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The defect chemistry of this system, which determines the electrical properties, is dominated by the high concentration of oxide vacancies necessary to stabilise the cubic structure, hence electronic conductivity exhibits a p(O-2)(-1/4) dependence on oxygen partial pressure.
Titulo: Development of novel anodes for solid oxide fuel cells
